FuncDef:
The protocol inbound ssh port 830 command configures well-known port 830 to establish an SNETCONF connection.
The undo protocol inbound ssh port 830 command restores the default setting.
By default, SNETCONF connections are established using well-known port 22.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The protocol inbound ssh port 830 command specifies well-known port 830 as the SNETCONF port.
When you run the protocol inbound ssh port 830 command, the SNETCONF server automatically monitors port 830. You do not need to manually change the monitoring port number.
